page.title: 11FARMS HORTICULTURE
page.content: The market gardening year at the Appletree Nursery at 36 South Road (formerly the Land Settlement Assoc- iation) begins in November making glasshouses ready & planting lettuces. The seeds are propogated in Dec & Christmas lettuce cut. Jan is main- tenance time & celery seedlings are pricked out. Peppers & tomatoes are sown in Feb, lettuces cut in March & tomatoes & celery planted. Mobile houses used for celery are moved in June. Tomato picking begins in August, peppers are marketed in Sept. Crops are sprayed all year against pests and disease. Blowfly maggots are placed in glasshouses in June & July & when hatched pollinate the flowers. All crops for market are washed & graded.
